img_summary: The image shows a detailed view of a lantern with a lattice design, likely used as an environmental object within a video game. The lantern features a white surface with a diamond-shaped grid pattern and has red markings or symbols on one side. It is suspended by a rope, suggesting it might be hanging in a setting such as a temple or traditional building. This object could serve as a decorative element or a source of light in the game, potentially influencing the ambiance or guiding players through a specific area. There are no visible characters, enemies, or UI components in the image.
